item.description:
The Worcester VegFest is a FREE festival that brings together residents to celebrate veganismâ€“an animal-friendly, environmentally sustainable, and healthy lifestyle. Our event features socially responsible businesses, inspiring speakers, musicians, and lots of free samples of tasty vegan food.

Speakers
The 2010 Worcester VegFest brings together top national speakers to discuss the latest in clinical nutrition, animal rights campaigns, getting involved in the vegetarian movement, and connecting veganism to other social movements.

Our four speakers are Dr. Michael Greger, Erica Meier, Jon Camp, and John Sanbonmatu. (more about speakers: http://vegworcester.c...)

(If you know a group that would be interested in sponsoring the event or setting up a table, send them to: http://vegworcester.c...)

More info http://WorcesterVegFe...
item.name: 2010 Worcester VegFest!!!
